dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1782 IH: Supporting all Healthy Options when Purchasing Produce Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Crockett (for herself, Mr. Alford, and Mrs. Hayes) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to provide families year-round access to nutrition incentives under the Gus Schumacher Nutrition Incentive Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting all Healthy Options when Purchasing Produce Act of 2025 or the SHOPP Act of 2025.

section.header: Nutrition incentives under Gus Schumacher Nutrition Incentive Program
section.text: Section 4405 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 7517) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by redesignating clauses (ix) and (x) as clauses (x) and (xi), respectively; and
by inserting after clause (viii) the following:

clause.text: increase the year-round availability of the incentive described in subparagraph (A)(ii)(II) by offering fresh frozen fruits or vegetables;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A), by striking fruits and vegetables and inserting fruits, vegetables, and legumes; and
in paragraph (3), by striking fresh fruits and vegetables each place it appears and inserting fresh or fresh frozen fruits, vegetables, and legumes.
